name: Administrative violation system
text:
With the mutual consent of both the commission and the department, the commission may use the civil natural resource violations system of the department of land and natural resources; provided that the commission shall act whenever the board is authorized to act, to process violations of chapter 6K or any rules adopted thereunder. [L 2004, c 142, §3]
Cross References
  Civil natural resource violations act, see chapter 199D.
